title: Aloo matar rice
ingredients: ['1 potato', '50g frozen garden peas', '2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '1 onion, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1/2 teaspoon brown mustard seeds', '1/4 teaspoon turmeric', '2 to 3 curry leaves', '1 green chilli, left whole', '300g leftover cooked rice', '2 teaspoons lemon juice']
